title: NewsBreak: Oil Falls on Reports Saudi Production to be Restored by Next Week
text:
NewsBreak: Oil Falls on Reports Saudi Production to be Restored by Next Week

Commodities 32 minutes ago (Sep 23, 2019 06:07AM ET)

© Reuters. Investing.com - Oil prices reversed gains on Monday following reports that top crude exporter Saudi Arabia is due to restore oil production as soon as next week after an attack on key output facilities earlier this month. was down 30 cents to $63.97 a barrel by 6:00 AM ET (10:00GMT). U.S. West Texas Intermediate fell 33 cents to $57.76. The price reversal came after Reuters reported that Saudi's Khurais and Abqaiq oil facilities are set to have restored oil production by next week.

NewsBreak: Oil Falls on Reports Saudi Production to be Restored by Next Week
description: NewsBreak: Oil Falls on Reports Saudi Production to be Restored by Next Week
